Was playing Comp. Got kicked bc Vac couldn't verify one of my files. Had to reverify the files. Took 10 mins to verify all the files again, bc I had to run it 3 times to get it to work. Got a temp ban for not reconnecting within 5 mins.

Best game ever.

Update: The game crashed so hard I had to force reboot my PC. Got a two hour comp ban as a result. My statement stands: best game of 2021.

Super fun 1st person shooter game.  Played the COD series for years then switched to CSGO 8 years ago and never went back!  More challenging game requiring teamwork to complete the mission.  Very affordable and always receiving updates to skins and maps.  It does not require a high powered gaming workstation to run either.  I also like the fact that there are very few kids playing the game.  Thank You Fortnite...
